segments.en: Numbered Discourses 5
25. Bad Conduct
249. A Charnel Ground
“Mendicants, there are these five drawbacks to a charnel ground.
What five?

segments.pli: Asuci, duggandhā, sappaṭibhayā, vāḷānaṃ amanussānaṃ āvāso, bahuno janassa ārodanā—
segments.en: It’s filthy, stinking, frightening, a gathering place for savage monsters, and a weeping place for many people.

segments.pli: ime kho, bhikkhave, pañca ādīnavā sivathikāya.
segments.en: These are the five drawbacks of a charnel ground.

segments.pli: Evamevaṃ kho, bhikkhave, pañcime ādīnavā sivathikūpame puggale.
segments.en: In the same way there are five drawbacks of a person like a charnel ground.
What five?

segments.pli: Idha, bhikkhave, ekacco puggalo asucinā kāyakammena samannāgato hoti;
segments.en: To start with, some person has filthy conduct by way of body, speech, and mind.
This is how they’re filthy, I say.
That person is just as filthy as a charnel ground.

segments.pli: Tassa asucinā kāyakammena samannāgatassa, asucinā vacīkammena samannāgatassa, asucinā manokammena samannāgatassa pāpako kittisaddo abbhuggacchati.
segments.en: Because of their filthy conduct, they get a bad reputation.
This is how they’re stinky, I say.
That person is just as stinky as a charnel ground.

segments.pli: Tamenaṃ asucinā kāyakammena samannāgataṃ, asucinā vacīkammena samannāgataṃ, asucinā manokammena samannāgataṃ pesalā sabrahmacārī ārakā parivajjanti.
segments.en: Because of their filthy conduct, good-hearted spiritual companions avoid them from afar.
That’s how they’re frightening, I say.
That person is just as frightening as a charnel ground.

segments.pli: So asucinā kāyakammena samannāgato, asucinā vacīkammena samannāgato, asucinā manokammena samannāgato sabhāgehi puggalehi saddhiṃ saṃvasati.
segments.en: Because of their filthy conduct, they live together with people of a similar character.
This is how they gather with savage monsters, I say.

segments.pli: Seyyathāpi sā, bhikkhave, sivathikā vāḷānaṃ amanussānaṃ āvāso;
segments.en: That person is just as much a gathering place of savage monsters as a charnel ground.

segments.pli: Tamenaṃ asucinā kāyakammena samannāgataṃ, asucinā vacīkammena samannāgataṃ, asucinā manokammena samannāgataṃ pesalā sabrahmacārī disvā khīyadhammaṃ āpajjanti:
segments.en: Because of their filthy conduct, when good-hearted spiritual companions see them they complain:

segments.pli: ‘aho vata no dukkhaṃ ye mayaṃ evarūpehi puggalehi saddhiṃ saṃvasāmā’ti.
segments.en: ‘Oh, it’s so painful for us to have to live together with such as these.’
This is how there’s weeping, I say.

segments.pli: Seyyathāpi sā, bhikkhave, sivathikā bahuno janassa ārodanā;
segments.en: This person is just as much a weeping place for many people as a charnel ground.

segments.pli: Ime kho, bhikkhave, pañca ādīnavā sivathikūpame puggale”ti.
segments.en: These are the five drawbacks of a person like a charnel ground.”
